msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: striker
msg: Add apr_os_pipe_put_ex(), which allows the caller to tell APR
to establish a cleanup on the pipe.
Submitted by: Jeff Trawick, Brad Nicholes

author: bnicholes
msg: Enable large file support for NetWare

author: wrowe
msg: Introduce apr_socket_atmark() with a more friendly failure case when the
SIOCATMARK symbol isn't available, to avoid breaking APR 0.9/httpd 2.0
distributions.  [William Rowe, Jim Jagielski, Brian Havard and Jeff Trawick]

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: get apr_socket_atmark() to build, adding a required size parameter to
